title: Mechanical
content: We have the worst teacher in EC for mechanical... Is there any alternate sources where we can learn the subject from...

comments.body:
Just by heart the slides
Donâ€™t wander here and there since there arenâ€™t any other good resources available
For me its very hard to mup up something without understanding atleast something about it..

lol satish?

i used to sleep or play among us through my mechanical classes and somehow got an A by just memorizing the slides. i'd copy paste everything into GPT and get it to dumb it down for me. for my batch it was a 3 credit course, so most people didn't take it too seriously.
ahh lmao i had him for a while too. for some reason, he'd always pick me to draw on the board and i guess that was the only thing that scared me into studying that shitty subject.
maybe go about reading the prescribed text book then. Mucking up the slides is enough but if you need explanation then text book it is.
